mng: to sow, to scatter, to spread, to broadcast, Taiwan pr. [bo4]

exm.mng: to disseminate, to propagate, to spread
broadcast, broadcasting, to broadcast, (formal) to propagate, to publicize
live broadcast (not recorded), direct Internet broadcasting, (agriculture) direct seeding
radio broadcast, podcast, Internet audio subscription service
webcast, to request item for broadcast on radio program, dibble seeding, spot seeding
to exhibit as broadcast, to show (on TV)
to broadcast a film, to televise
